title: Scout (Eclipse)
description:
Next up for the ECUP is Scout, by the excellent Timothy Truman! The wonderful world of Wiki says:

Scout is a comic book series starting in 1985 by American writer, artist and musician Timothy Truman. It was published by Eclipse Comics.

The story stars a Native American Apache named Emanuel Santana. The setting of the series was a chaotic United States.

Twenty-four issues of the first series were published.

After the series ended, a short comic featuring Santana's marriage ceremony was published inside Timothy Truman's first album release entitled Marauder by his band The Dixie Pistols.

Two mini-series were published that 'bridged the gap' between the two Scout series: New America and Swords of Texas, each 4 issues long. While Truman oversaw them, others wrote and drew them. A one-shot 'Scout Handbook' was also published. A new series entitled Scout: War Shaman continued Santana's adventures after having two children and being widowed. The series ended with issue #16, after Scout is killed. 

This torrent includes all the Scout listed above (except the one from the album), AS WELL AS a six-issue mini that Truman did with his son, Benjamin, called 'Hawken'. Please note that Hawken has nothing to do with Scout, but it's Tim Truman and it's a bit of alright, so in did I chuck it.

Get it, seed it! Many thanks to the creators and scanners!
